entities.name: weasley
entities.description: Weasley is mentioned as examining the Deluminator. (Chapter 7) Weasley examined the Deluminator for the third or fourth time.

entities.name: deluminator
entities.description: The Deluminator is a device that Weasley examines multiple times. (Chapter 7) Weasley examined the Deluminator for the third or fourth time.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as being late to dinner and having a conversation with Hermione. (Chapter 7) Mrs. Weasley said tentatively, “Harry, dear, everyone’s awfully hungry, we didn’t like to start without you.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as having a conversation with Harry and helping Mrs. Weasley restore the garden. (Chapter 7) “Meet us upstairs,” Harry whispered to Hermione, while they helped Mrs. Weasley restore the garden to its normal state.

entities.name: mrs weasley
entities.description: Mrs. Weasley is mentioned as hosting a dinner party and helping with the cleanup. (Chapter 7) They all ate rather hurriedly and then, after a hasty chorus of “Happy Birthday” and much gulping of cake, the party broke up.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as being invited to the wedding and setting up a tent. (Chapter 7) Hagrid, who was invited to the wedding the following day, but was far too bulky to sleep in the overstretched Burrow, left to set up a tent for himself in a neighboring field.

entities.name: marauder's map
entities.description: The Marauder’s Map is mentioned as one of Harry’s most prized items. (Chapter 7) Harry ﬁlled Hagrid’s mokeskin purse, not with gold, but with those items he most prized, apparently worthless though some of them were: the Marauder’s Map.

entities.name: sirius's enchanted mirror
entities.description: Sirius’s Enchanted Mirror is mentioned as one of Harry’s most prized items. (Chapter 7) Harry ﬁlled Hagrid’s mokeskin purse, not with gold, but with those items he most prized, apparently worthless though some of them were: the Marauder’s Map, the shard of Sirius’s enchanted mirror.

entities.name: r.a.b.'s
entities.description: R.A.B.’s is mentioned as one of Harry’s most prized items. (Chapter 7) Harry ﬁlled Hagrid’s mokeskin purse, not with gold, but with those items he most prized, apparently worthless though some of them were: the Marauder’s Map, the shard of Sirius’s enchanted mirror, and R.A.B.’s
